member.summary: Extracts the error code returned by the stored procedure via a return parameter.
member.param: The object from which to extract the error code.
member.returns: A value returned by the stored procedure.

member.summary: Gets the based on the retrieved from .

The , which should be specified as an inner exception inside the returned exception.
Optional exception message. If not provided, default one will be used.
member.exception: returns error code which is not defined in .
is null.
member.remarks:
If has values ,
or , null is returned, because for these statuses no exception exists.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlDataProvider
member.summary: Represents a base class for data providers targeting Microsoft SQL Server.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlDataProvider.#ctor(Sitecore.Processing.Common.IConnectionStringResolver,System.String,System.TimeSpan,Sitecore.Framework.TransientFaultHandling.IRetryerRegistry,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of class.
member.param: An object to resolve the connection string itself using its name as an identifier.
Name of the connection string used to establish connection with database.
The wait time before the execution attempt of a database command is terminated and an error is generated.
The retryer registry that is responsible for managing the creation and access to a set of named instances.
The name of a that is registered for the sql provider.
If set to true SQL command column encryption is enabled.
member.exception: Argument is a null reference.
Argument is a null reference.
Argument is a null reference.
Argument is a null reference.
Argument is empty or white space.
Connection string name not found by resolver.
Retryer by specified name is not registered.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlDataProvider.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets the connection string used by the current data provider.
member.value: A value that contains the connection string used by the current data provider.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlDataProvider.CommandTimeout
member.summary: Gets the wait time before the execution attempt of a database command is terminated and an error is generated.
member.value: The wait time before the execution attempt of a database command is terminated and an error is generated.
member.remarks: This value is passed straight to the database command objects.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlDataProvider.RetryPolicy
member.summary: Gets the retry policy that defines the behaviour for strategies that perform retrying of work until it is either successful or reaches a terminating failure state.
member.returns: A object initialized from the by name of the retryer specific to the provider.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlDataProvider.SqlCommandColumnEncryptionEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether SQL command column encryption is enabled.
member.value: true if SQL command column encryption is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlDataProvider.CreateDatabaseConnection
member.summary: Creates a new object using the connection string specified in the constructor.
member.returns: A object initialized with the connection string and SQL credentials specified with the constructor. The connection needs to be opened before it can be used.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlDataProvider.CreateCommandForStoredProcedure(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter},System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandColumnEncryptionSetting)
member.summary: Creates a command to execute against a database.
member.param: A object that represents the database connection to use.
The name of the database schema that contains the stored procedure to execute.
A name of the stored procedure to execute.
A read-only collection of the objects representing the parameters expected by the stored procedure.
The SQL command column encryption setting.
member.exception: Any of the , , , or arguments is a null reference.

member.summary: Creates a command to execute against a database.
member.param: A object that represents the database connection to use.
The object that represents the transaction to associate the command with.
The name of the database schema that contains the stored procedure to execute.
A name of the stored procedure to execute.
A read-only collection of the objects representing the parameters expected by the stored procedure.
The SQL command column encryption setting.
member.exception: Any of the , , , or arguments is a null reference.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode
member.summary: Defines error codes returned by stored procedures.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.Succeeded
member.summary: The execution of the stored procedure completed successfully.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.InputValidationError
member.summary: The execution of the stored procedure failed due to invalid input parameters.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.EntityAlreadyExists
member.summary: The execution of the stored procedure failed because the entity already exists.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.EntityDoesNotExist
member.summary: The execution of the stored procedure failed because the entity does not exist.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.GeneralError
member.summary: The execution of the stored procedure failed due to an error generated by the database server.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.NotInTransaction
member.summary: The execution of the stored procedure failed because it was not executed in the context of a transaction.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.ConcurrentlyModified
member.summary: The execution of the stored procedure failed because an entity was concurrently modified.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.InvalidTaskType
member.summary: The execution of the stored procedure failed because type of a task is invalid.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.InvalidTaskState
member.summary: The execution of the stored procedure failed because an operation is not allowed for a task in a current state.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.UnavailableDatabase
member.summary: The execution of the stored procedure failed because database is unavailable.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlRoutineErrorCode.Unknown
member.summary: The stored procedure did not return an error code.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlUtility
member.summary: Provides static helper methods used by SQL data provider implementations.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Common.Sql.SqlUtility.FormatObjectName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Formats the name of the specified database object by adding the schema name and delimiters to it.

member.returns: The formatted name of the database objects.
member.exception: Argument or argument is a null reference.

member.exception: Argument is a null reference.

is null.
